name: Hell Climber
description:
*Contain violence

Game was made by OneDotOneTeam:

  • https://fewmade.itch.io/
  • https://sporist.itch.io/
  • https://greennnn.itch.io/

Escape from hell by defending your building drones and shooting demons

Reach the highest score and win your friends!

Controls:

A,D - Move Right, Left

Space - Jump(hold to make jump longer)

LBM - Shoot

RBM - Use hook

E - Repair drones or Reach new level

You can play tutorial to understand gameplay properly

Music taken from assetstore
